nodes.bodyText: I usually refrain from using exclamation marks in user messages but feel free to ignore.

________________________________________
/ Using Java versions older than 11 to   \
| build Quarkus applications is          |
| deprecated and will be disallowed in a |
\ future release. I mean, moo            /
 ----------------------------------------
        \   ^__^
         \  (oo)\_______
            (__)\       )\/\
                ||----w |
                ||     ||
Ok, well, I will merge the version with the exclamation mark before someone comes with more brilliant ideas :).
